original: assert(Hnkp: (N - K) * p = n - k - (n0 - k0)). - rewrite Hn, Hk, Hnk. ring. rewrite Hnkp. clear Hnkp. assert(HfactNK: fact N = binomial N K * fact K * fact (N - K)). - apply binomial_thm. apply H1. assert(HfactN: fact n = binomial n k * fact k * fact (n - k)). - apply binomial_thm. apply Hkn. rewrite HfactN, HfactNK. clear HfactN HfactNK. rewrite <- mprod_factorial_euclid, <- mprod_factorial_euclid, <- mprod_factorial_Zp. assert(1: fact (N * p + n0 - k0) = expo (N * p + n0 - k0) p * fact (N * p + n0) * Π (N * p + n0 - k0) (λ i, i + (N * p + 1))). + apply mprod_factorial_euclid. assert(2: fact k0 = Π k0 (λ i, i + (K * p + 1))). + apply mprod_factorial_Zp.
